properties.areaDesc: Leake, MS; Hinds, MS; Holmes, MS; Scott, MS; Rankin, MS; Attala, MS; Issaquena, MS; Sharkey, MS; Warren, MS; Madison, MS; Madison, LA; Yazoo, MS; Smith, MS
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 2:12PM CST until January 14 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for Urban Areas and Small Streams in...
East central Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana...
Leake County in central Mississippi...
Rankin County in central Mississippi...
Warren County in west central Mississippi...
Northern Smith County in central Mississippi...
Attala County in central Mississippi...
Scott County in central Mississippi...
Madison County in central Mississippi...
Southern Holmes County in central Mississippi...
Yazoo County in central Mississippi...
Hinds County in central Mississippi...
Southeastern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi...
Southern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi...

* Until 1115 PM CST Tuesday.

* At 208 PM CST, Various local officials have reported flooding
across much of central Mississippi. Due to large amounts of runoff
from 3 to 6 inches of rainfall this morning, some flooding issues
will linger through the afternoon into the evening. Also, some
additinal rainfall will move back into the area and more flash
flood warnings may be needed if high rainfall rates develop.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Jackson, Clinton, Pearl, Madison, Ridgeland, Vicksburg, Brandon,
Canton, Byram, Yazoo City, Flowood, Kosciusko, Richland, Forest,
Carthage, Morton, Durant, Redwood, Thornton and Star.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
